name: Hot Pussy College 2 🍓🔞
description:
Hot Pussy College 2 is a short adult Visual Novel focusing on the fun parts of college life.
This game that will transport you into the world of college life, where you can experience vivid emotions, a plethora of sexual and romantic situations, humor, and adventure. You will encounter numerous sexual and romantic scenes, thrilling adventures, and exclusive emotions.
Hot Pussy College 2 is an excellent choice for those who love intriguing plots, humor, and romance. It is the perfect entertainment for adults who want to relax and enjoy pleasant emotions
Features:
Plenty of lewd scenes with various girls
A fascinating story
A Multitude of Sexy Situations
Real-time 3D character and animations
Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
